#JeffersonJewelryForYou.
So, you're engaged.

That's still in discussion.

When Grandma and I were at The Wishing Tree,

Avy, honey, um… I just… It's just not that easy.

Not in so many words, no.
There's still time, Dad.
I think you should tell her.
- Go get dressed. Go tell her. Let's go! - Okay, all right.

I'll take the snowmobile!
Maybe not.
Dad?
What is that?
What is that?
What is this doing here?
- Did you and Grandma do this? - No. Where did it come from?

translation.en: - You bet! - All right.
My Christmas wish.
It is coming true.
A couple of hours from now, we'll be taking selfies on a beautiful beach.

translation.en: You know what? You go on ahead.
- Um, I'll meet you at the car. - Don't be too long.

translation.es: - No. - No quiero perder el vuelo.

translation.en: Daddy?
I'm really sorry I didn't get a chance to tell you
translation.es: Lamento no haberte llegado a contar

translation.en: about me and Tad, the engagement.
Oh, it's okay, honey.
You know, the most important thing to me is that you're happy.
translation.es: Lo más importante para mí es que seas feliz.

translation.en: You are happy, aren't you?
Yeah.
About the job.
translation.es: - Y el trabajo… - Olvídate de eso.

translation.en: Don't worry about the job. It'll be here when you get back.

translation.en: That's the thing. I don't want it to be.

translation.en: I don't understand.
Vice President of Atmosphere? You just did that to take care of me.

translation.en: Well, maybe a little, but I--
And I love you for it, and I'll always be your daughter.
translation.es: Y te amo por eso, y siempre seré tu hija.

translation.en: I just… I need to find my own way. I hope you're not angry.
translation.es: Solo necesito encontrar mi propio camino. No te enojes.

translation.en: Angry?
No.
I don't think I've ever been more proud of you.
translation.es: Nunca estuve más orgulloso de ti.

translation.en: Really?
I told you I promised your mother that I'd take care of you.
translation.es: Te dije que le prometí a tu madre que te cuidaría.

translation.en: Well…
Looks like you're starting to take care of yourself.

translation.en: I love you, Dad.
I love you too.
Your mother would be so proud of you.
Thanks, Daddy.
Okay.
All right.
Merry Christmas, North Star Lodge.

- - Oh, may I place you on hold for a moment?

- - Merry Christmas, North Star Lodge.

North Star Lodge?
Oh my goodness.

Alejandra, hey!

we're sold out!

Are you breaking up with me?
On Christmas Day?

Oh! And at the holidays too. Oh.

- Much better. -
Wait! Wait! Wait! Wait! Stop the car. Don't move.

Look, can you just give me… give me one second.

and you'll probably gonna think I'm crazy for saying this.

translation.en: Well, that's very flattering, but I have other plans.

translation.en: Happy Christmas.
Happy Christmas.
Uh, excuse me, son.
I believe what you're looking for is in the back courtyard.

I thought you were leaving.
Uh, no, change of plans. I'm staying here

translation.en: without Tad.
You are?

translation.en: That would be amazing.
Well, my dad did also mention investing in the North Star,

translation.en: - Right. -

translation.en: Well, you know what? Um…
There is this holiday tradition.

translation.en: - - It's, uh…

Sierra!

- Hey. -

Merry Christmas!

Shoot. Oh my God.

Let's go!
